import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.scss'] }) export class NavbarComponent { @Input() rol: 'cliente' | 'admin' | 'tecnico' = 'cliente'; }
